docs.title: Welcome to JokerPlus Documentation
docs.text: Welcome to the official documentation for JokerPlus.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: Start by heading to Authentication

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Beautiful Material Design theme
  • Dark/Light mode toggle
  • Code syntax highlighting
  • Search functionality
  • Responsive navigation

Built with Material for MkDocs

docs.title: Changelog
docs.text: All notable changes to JokerPlus API will be documented in this file.

docs.title: Added
docs.text: • New features in development

docs.title: Changed
docs.text: • Improvements in progress

docs.title: Changed
docs.text: • Soccer API: Updated DeleteSoccerFavourite parameter from "FavouriteId" to "LeagueId", "TeamId"

docs.title: Added
docs.text:
• Soccer API: GetLeagueMatches
  • Soccer API: GetLeagueInfo
  • Soccer API: GetLeagueStanding
  • Soccer API: GenerateTokenForSoccerWeb

docs.title: Fixed
docs.text:
• Soccer API: Fixed GetOnboardingStatus
  • Soccer API: Fixed SetOnboardingStatus (now only accepts "IsFinished" as true)

docs.title: Changed
docs.text:
• Soccer API: Updated GetSoccerBetHistory response with data Total, Page, Size, SoccerBetHistory
  • Enhanced paging data for APIs

docs.title: Changed
docs.text: • Soccer API: Updated SoccerBet to return grouped bet type and summary

docs.title: Changed
docs.text:
• Soccer API: Updated UpdateSoccerBetSlip (only updates bet amount)
  • Soccer API: Updated GetSoccerBetSlip (returns data based on Match with bet slip list and paging)
  • Soccer API: Updated GetSoccerBetHistory (returns grouped bet type with paging feature)

docs.title: Changed
docs.text: • Soccer API: Updated DeleteSoccerBetSlip to support batch delete

docs.title: Added
docs.text:
• Soccer API: GetOnboardingStatus
  • Soccer API: SetOnboardingStatus
  • Soccer API: GetTeamList

docs.title: Changed
docs.text:
• Soccer API: Updated GetLeagueList
  • Soccer API: Updated GetMatchInfo
  • Soccer API: Updated GetMatchList

docs.title: Added
docs.text:
• Soccer API: AddSoccerFavourite
  • Soccer API: DeleteSoccerFavourite
  • Soccer API: GetSoccerFavouriteData
  • Soccer API: GetSoccerFavouriteList

docs.title: Added
docs.text:
• Soccer API: BetSlip API (Get, Add, Update, Delete)
  • Soccer API: MatchList
  • Soccer API: Odds

docs.title: Added
docs.text:
• Soccer API: SoccerBet
  • Soccer API: GetSoccerBetHistory

docs.title: Added
docs.text:
• Soccer API: GetMatchInfo
  • Soccer API: GetLeagueList
  • Soccer API: GetSeasonStanding
  • Soccer API: GetTeamInfo

docs.title: Changed
docs.text: • Slot & Casino: Modified TransferCreditToGame API to auto withdraw last 3rd party game balance when transferring to other games

docs.title: Added
docs.text: • Slot API: GetSlotRoomList (PRAGMATIC)

docs.title: Added
docs.text:
• Slot API: TransferCreditToGame
  • Slot API: TransferCreditFromGame

docs.title: Changed
docs.text: • Slot & Casino: Updated GetSlotGameList [Pragmatic] JSON response

docs.title: Added
docs.text:
• Slot & Casino API: GetSlotGameList
  • Slot & Casino API: GetLiveCasinoList

docs.title: Added
docs.text: • SBO: SBO login API

docs.title: Added
docs.text:
• Casino API: TransferCreditToGame
  • Casino API: TransferCreditFromGame

docs.title: Added
docs.text:
• Lucky7: Added sold out features for Lucky7Bet (LuckyBall, MissMatch, ThreeBall, OddsEvens)
  • Lucky7: Auto-handle bet limits (when limit is 2 and user amount is 3, allows buying 2 only)
  • Lucky7: Added SoldOutAmount value and special message for sold out scenarios

docs.title: Changed
docs.text: • Lucky7: Updated GetBetHistory to include SoldOutAmount for LuckyBall, MissMatch, ThreeBall, OddsEvens

docs.title: Added
docs.text:
• Login API: Added WinRecordList Data to LoginBySocialApp, LoginByUsername, LoginPin
  • Member API: UpdateWinNoticeStatus

docs.title: Added
docs.text: • Aus4D: Added odds value support [2d, 3d, 4d] in GetGameOdds

docs.title: Changed
docs.text: • Aus4D: Updated Aus4dBet request parameter "Odds (decimal)" to check latest odds

docs.title: Changed
docs.text: • Lucky Seven: GetResult API changed from DrawDate to FromDate, ToDate parameters

docs.title: Added
docs.text: • Beta Mission: Added Clear Mission Status functionality

docs.title: Changed
docs.text:
• Beta Mission: Modified GetMissionStatus, CompleteMission, SubmitFeedback - removed betaMissionStatusId return
  • Beta Mission: Modified CompleteMission, SubmitFeedback - added BetaMissionId return

docs.title: Added
docs.text: • Beta Mission: Added betaMissionStatusId return to GetMissionStatus

docs.title: Fixed
docs.text:
• Beta Mission: Fixed return reward ID in GetMissionStatus
  • Beta Mission: Added betaMissionStatusId return to SubmitFeedback

docs.title: Changed
docs.text:
• Beta Mission: Modified GetMissionStatus, SubmitMissionFeedBack, CompleteMission, CheckHasUnclaimedMission, ClaimMissionPoint
  • Beta Mission: Beta Mission ID modified (refer to reference table)

docs.title: Added
docs.text: • Lucky7: Added RedLimit to all Lucky7 Bet operations

docs.title: Fixed
docs.text:
• Lucky7: Fixed result issue
  • Security: Password length validation updated to 6-16 characters

docs.title: Added
docs.text: • Security: Local VerifyCode API

docs.title: Changed
docs.text: • Security: Updated local ResetPIN request parameter and response message

docs.title: Added
docs.text: • Security: SendVerifyCodeForResetPIN API

docs.title: Changed
docs.text: • Security: Updated ResetPIN request parameter and response message

docs.title: Changed
docs.text: • Beta Mission: Updated CompleteMission response

docs.title: Added
docs.text: • Member API: RecoverUsernameByEmail

docs.title: Changed
docs.text:
• BREAKING: Get4DCompanyList V2 and SelectBettingCompany V2 new structure
  • BREAKING: API link changed to [LOCAL API URL]/Lottery2/[API NAME]
  • Important: Pass CompanyId when placing bets, not CompanyMainId

docs.title: Changed
docs.text: • Lucky7: Updated GetResult response

docs.title: Added
docs.text: • Lucky7: GetResult API

docs.title: Changed
docs.text: • Support: Updated SubmitChatTicket API response code and message

docs.title: Added
docs.text: • Member API: SendSmsVerifyForUpdateEmail

docs.title: Changed
docs.text:
• Member API: Updated Member Action
  • Member API: Updated UpdateEmail API request and response

docs.title: Changed
docs.text: • Beta Mission: Updated response in GetMissionStatus

docs.title: Added
docs.text:
• Wallet API: GetMemberWalletBalance()
  • Aus4D: Added GameTypeId

docs.title: Changed
docs.text:
• Lucky7: Updated response data for all bet styles (added IsFav, ReceiptId, OrderId)
  • Lucky7: Updated GetBetHistory request parameters and response data
  • Lucky7: Updated GetGameOdds response data
  • Lottery4D: Timestamp converted to UTC-0
  • Lottery4D: Get Single Bet Company changed to GD lotto

docs.title: Fixed
docs.text: • Lottery4D: If company closed, response JSON result will be different and receipt will not be generated

docs.title: Changed
docs.text: • Beta Mission: Updated SubmitMissionFeedbackAndClaimReward response

docs.title: Added
docs.text: • Lucky7: GetLucky7Company API

docs.title: Changed
docs.text:
• BREAKING: GetAus4dBetNextDrawTime CompanyId and CompanyName changed to Id and Name
  • Removed: TimeSlot removed from GetAus4dBetNextDrawTime
  • Performance: GetTransactionHistory linked to SQL

docs.title: Added
docs.text:
• Lucky7 API: Complete Lucky7 API implementation
  • Timezone: Aus4D timestamp converted to UTC-0

docs.title: Changed
docs.text: • Temporary: AUS4D timestamp values temporarily returned in UTC+8 instead of UTC+0 (now fixed)

docs.text:
Press Ctrl+Alt+Del to restart.

Use Cmd+C to copy and Cmd+V to paste.

docs.title: Footnotes
docs.text:
Here's some text with a footnote1.

Here's another footnote2.

docs.title: Inline Math
docs.text: Inline math: \(E = mc^2\) and \(\sum_{i=1}^{n} x_i = x_1 + x_2 + \cdots + x_n\)

docs.title: Block Math
docs.text: \[ \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} e^{-x^2} dx = \sqrt{\pi} \]

docs.title: Multiple Equations
docs.text: \[ \begin{align} f(x) &= ax^2 + bx + c \\ f'(x) &= 2ax + b \\ f''(x) &= 2a \end{align} \]

docs.title: Matrix Example
docs.text: \[ \begin{pmatrix} a & b \\ c & d \end{pmatrix} \begin{pmatrix} x \\ y \end{pmatrix} =  \begin{pmatrix} ax + by \\ cx + dy \end{pmatrix} \]

docs.title: Alternative Delimiters
docs.text:
Using parentheses: \(x^2 + y^2 = z^2\)

Using brackets: [E = \frac{mc2}{\sqrt{1-\frac{v2}{c^2}}}]

docs.title: Complex Example
docs.text:
API Response Format

Success ResponseError Response 
{
  "status": "success",
  "data": {
    "id": 123,
    "name": "John Doe"
  }
}

{
  "status": "error",
  "message": "User not found",
  "code": 404
}

Tip

All responses include appropriate HTTP status codes.

    D --> E

docs.title: Lottery (4D) API
docs.text: Documentation for lottery and 4D betting endpoints.

docs.title: Get Latest Draw
docs.text:
GET /api/lottery/4d/latest

Description: Get the latest 4D lottery draw results.

Response:

{
  "status": "success",
  "draw_date": "2025-11-24",
  "draw_number": "1234",
  "results": {
    "first_prize": "1234",
    "second_prize": "5678",
    "third_prize": "9012"
  }
}

docs.title: Place Bet
docs.text:
POST /api/lottery/4d/bet

Description: Place a 4D lottery bet.

Request Body:

{
  "numbers": ["1234", "5678"],
  "bet_type": "big",
  "amount": 10.00,
  "draw_date": "2025-11-25"
}

Response:

{
  "status": "success",
  "bet_id": "bet_123456",
  "total_amount": 20.00,
  "message": "Bet placed successfully"
}

docs.title: Get Bet History
docs.text:
GET /api/lottery/4d/history

Description: Get user's 4D betting history.

Query Parameters:

Parameter Type Description limit integer Number of records to return offset integer Pagination offset

Response:

{
  "status": "success",
  "bets": [
    {
      "bet_id": "bet_123456",
      "numbers": ["1234"],
      "amount": 10.00,
      "draw_date": "2025-11-25",
      "status": "pending"
    }
  ],
  "total": 10
}

docs.title: Check Winning
docs.text:
POST /api/lottery/4d/check-winning

Description: Check if a bet is a winning bet.

Request Body:

{
  "bet_id": "bet_123456"
}

Response:

{
  "status": "success",
  "is_winner": true,
  "winning_amount": 5000.00,
  "prize_category": "first"
}

docs.title: Requests
docs.text: PARAM VALUE URL [LOCAL API URL]/Member/LoginByPin Request Method POST Body Param AES_Encrypt([JSON Object], [AES Secret Key]);

docs.title: Parameters
docs.text: Key Name Data Type Mandatory Length Description MemberId int YES Pin String YES 4 NotificationToken String YES Firebase Token or other notification token OSVersion String YES Platform Int YES Refer to Platform PhoneBrand String YES Phone Brand, exp : Samsung, OPPO … PhoneModel String YES Phone Model PhoneImei String YES Phone Imei LineBrand String YES Network Brand LineCountry String YES Network Brand Country AppVersion String YES Joker Plus App Version Hash String YES SHA256(SocialAppType + SocialUID + NotificationToken + SHA256 Salt Key)

docs.title: Return
docs.text:
Key Name Data Type Mandatory Length Description Id Int YES Name String YES UserName String YES Email String YES MemberReferralCode String Yes 10-12 ImageUrl String YES Phone String YES ReferralBy Int YES Point Decimal YES CreateDate String YES We return the time in Universal Time format. Please convert to your local time (like UTC+10). WalletCash Decimal YES QuitPageFlag String YES WithdawBankId Int YES WithdrawBankAccName String YES WithdrawBankAccNumber String YES

WithdrawBankAccountList

Key Name Data Type Mandatory Length Description Id Int YES Link to some related table BankId Int YES Refer to Bank AccountName String YES AccountNumber String YES IsDefault Bool YES

DepositBankList

Key Name Data Type Mandatory Length Description Id Int YES Link to some related table BankId Int YES Refer to Bank AccountName String YES AccountNumber String YES MemberSecretKey String YES

InterestList

Key Name Data Type Mandatory Length Description Id Int YES Name String YES

CreditCardList

Key Name Data Type Mandatory Length Description Id Int YES Company Int YES Refer to Credit Card Company CardNumber String YES CardHolderName String YES ExpiryDate String YES IsDefault Bool YES LocalAPIURL String YES LoginFacebook String YES LoginGoogle String YES LoginApple String YES LinkDateFacebook String YES We return the time in Universal Time format. Please convert to your local time (like UTC+10). LinkDateGoogle String YES We return the time in Universal Time format. Please convert to your local time (like UTC+10). LinkDateApple String YES We return the time in Universal Time format. Please convert to your local time (like UTC+10). Language Int YES 1: EN 2:CN 3:MS …….. Language Code

Win Record List

Key Name Data Type Mandatory Length Description WinNoticeId Int YES Notification ID ReceiptId Int YES Win receipt Id for lucky7 (return 0 for GameType = 1) GameType Int YES Refer to GameType Lucky7BetStyleId Int YES Refer to Lucky7BetStyle OrderId int YES OrderId for GameType = 1, return 0 for GameType = 2"

Response

        {
            "Id": "Int",

    "DepositBankList": [

    ],

        {
            "Id": "Int",

        }
    ],

        {
            "Id": "Int",
            "Company": "Int",
            "CardNumber": "String",

            "ExpiryDate": "String",

                    "ReceiptId": int,
                    "GameType": int,
                    "Lucky7BetStyleId": int
                    "OrderId": int


                }
            ]
        }
    }

docs.title: Respose Message & Code
docs.text: ResponseCode ReponseMessage 5 Incorrect password 4 Invalid Password 3 Invalid Username 2 You have reach maximun invalid password access, please contact customer service for unlock account. 1 Account blocked, please contact customer service. 0 Success -1 Invalid Access -2 Internal server error -3 Unexpected error -4 Member not found

docs.title: Response Message & Code
docs.text: ResponseCode ReponseMessage 3 Account not found, please register 2 You have reach maximun invalid password access, please contact customer service for unlock account. 1 Account blocked, please contact customer service. 0 Success -1 Invalid Access -2 Internal server error -3 Unexpected error -4 Member not found -5 Invalid social app

docs.title: Parameters
docs.text: Key Name Data Type Mandatory Length Description Username String YES 6 - 30 Accept A-Z, a-z, 0-9, no symbol allow Name String YES 6 - 30 Accept A-Z,a-z no symbol allow RegisterType Int YES Refer to Register Type RegisterUID String Optional If Register type = 1,2,3 , then mandatory. Social ID Email String YES Password String YES 8 - 16 Pin String YES 4 PhoneNumber String YES Format 61xxxxxxxxx (Only Digit allow) TACCode String YES Tac code register ReferralBy String Optional Upline Member Code NotificationToken String YES Firebase Token or other notification token OSVersion String YES Platform Int YES Refer to Platform PhoneBrand String YES Phone Brand, exp : Samsung, OPPO … PhoneModel String YES Phone Model PhoneImei String YES Phone Imei LineBrand String YES Network Brand LineCountry String YES Network Brand Country AppVersion String YES Joker Plus App Version Language Int Optional 1: EN 2:CN 3:MS …….. Language Code EmailVerifyId Int Yes ID that get from email verification Hash String YES "SHA256( Name + Username + Password + Pin + Email + PhoneNumber + TACCode + EmailVerifyId + SHA256 Salt Key)"

docs.title: Soccer API
docs.text: Documentation for Soccer API endpoints.

docs.title: Get Soccer Matches
docs.text:
GET /api/soccer/matches

Description: Retrieve a list of soccer matches.

Response:

{
  "status": "success",
  "data": []
}

docs.title: Get Match Details
docs.text:
GET /api/soccer/match/{id}

Description: Retrieve details for a specific match.

Parameters:

Parameter Type Description id string Match ID

Response:

{
  "status": "success",
  "data": {}
}

docs.title: Wallet API
docs.text: Documentation for Wallet API endpoints.

docs.title: Get Balance
docs.text:
GET /api/wallet/balance

Description: Retrieve wallet balance.

Response:

{
  "status": "success",
  "balance": 0.00
}

docs.title: Deposit
docs.text:
POST /api/wallet/deposit

Description: Deposit funds into wallet.

Request Body:

{
  "amount": 100.00,
  "currency": "USD"
}

Response:

{
  "status": "success",
  "transaction_id": "txn_123456"
}

docs.title: Withdraw
docs.text:
POST /api/wallet/withdraw

Description: Withdraw funds from wallet.

Request Body:

{
  "amount": 50.00,
  "currency": "USD"
}

Response:

{
  "status": "success",
  "transaction_id": "txn_789012"
}

docs.title: Encryption
docs.text: Below are examples on how to do encryptions

docs.title: SHA-256
docs.text:
public static String SHA256(final String strText) {
    String strResult = null;
    if (strText != null && strText.length() > 0) {
        try {
            MessageDigest messageDigest = MessageDigest.getInstance("SHA-256");
            messageDigest.update(strText.getBytes("UTF-8"));
            byte byteBuffer[] = messageDigest.digest();
            StringBuffer strHexString = new StringBuffer();
            for (int i = 0; i < byteBuffer.length; i++) {
                String hex = Integer.toHexString(0xff & byteBuffer[i]);
                if (hex.length() == 1) {
                    strHexString.append('0');
                }
                strHexString.append(hex);
            }
            strResult = strHexString.toString();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | UnsupportedEncodingException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }
    return strResult;
}

docs.title: AES
docs.text:
public static String AES_Encrypt(String plainText, String key)
        throws UnsupportedEncodingException,
        InvalidKeyException,
        NoSuchAlgorithmException,
        NoSuchPaddingException,
        InvalidAlgorithmParameterException,
        IllegalBlockSizeException,
        BadPaddingException {
    byte[] plainTextbytes = plainText.getBytes("UTF-8");
    byte[] keyBytes = getKeyBytes(key);
    return Base64.encodeToString(encrypt(plainTextbytes, keyBytes, keyBytes), Base64.NO_WRAP);
}


private static byte[] getKeyBytes(String key)
        throws UnsupportedEncodingException {
    byte[] keyBytes = new byte[16];
    byte[] parameterKeyBytes = key.getBytes("UTF-8");
    System.arraycopy(parameterKeyBytes, 0, keyBytes, 0, Math.min(parameterKeyBytes.length, keyBytes.length));
    return keyBytes;
}

docs.title: Generate Encrypted string for http request body parameters
docs.text:
String sha256_salt = "qfYJpO87gm7MY7D1";
String aes_secret_key = "uNeQvp5Q76YMfQdx";
JSONObject obj = new JSONObject();
obj.put("Username","user001");
obj.put("Password","123456");
obj.put("Hash", SHA256("user001" + "123456" + sha256_salt)); 
String bodyParams = AES_Encrypt(String.valueOf(obj), aes_secret_key);
System.out.println(bodyParams);

docs.title: API Base URL
docs.text:
Before a user logs in, the system will use the MAIN API URL to communicate. Once the user logs in, the system will generate a special link called LOCAL API URL in the ResponseData. After the user logs in, most of the operations will be performed using this LOCAL API URL for communication with the API.

Development

Name Url MAIN API URL Refer to provided URL LOCAL API URL *Get from ResponseData.LocalAPIURL

Production

Name Url MAIN API URL Refer to provided url LOCAL API URL *Get from ResponseData.LocalAPIURL
